message: The SOURCE_TYPE field for indicator 3-3-5, translated into en
data:
Description:

The number of people requiring treatment and care for NTDs is measured by existing country systems, and reported through joint request and reporting forms for donated medicines, the integrated NTD database, and other reports to WHO.

https://www.who.int/teams/control-of-neglected-tropical-diseases/preventive-chemotherapy/joint-application-package

https://www.who.int/teams/control-of-neglected-tropical-diseases/preventive-chemotherapy/integrated-ntd-database

Country data are published via the WHO Global Health Observatory and Preventive Chemotherapy Data Portal.

https://www.who.int/data/gho/data/themes/neglected-tropical-diseases

http://apps.who.int/gho/cabinet/pc.jsp
